Title: Snapclaw
Description: A giant, poisonous crab is wrecking havoc on our local abalone stores.  I need you to go down into narsong trench and take it out!
ObjectivesText: Kill Snapclaw in a cave at the bottom of Narsong Trench and return with his claw as proof.
PortraitGiverText: Snapclaw has been wrecking havoc on the local abalone population.
